title: ACID ScraperZ - Anime
description: This is an Express provider package for Syncler written by JonathanAkaJD. This package is Anime specific and is intended to be used in conjunction with the ACID ScraperZ - TV&Movie package and ACID ScraperZ - Cached package.

title: ACID ScraperZ - BETA
description: This is an Express provider package for Syncler written by JonathanAkaJD. Use this package in conjunction with the ACID ScraperZ - Cached package.

title: ACID ScraperZ - TV&Movie
description: This is an BETA Express provider package for Syncler written by JonathanAkaJD. Use this package in conjunction with the ACID ScraperZ - Cached package.

title: ACID ScraperZ - Cached
description: This is a Kosmos provider package for Syncler written by JonathanAkaJD. Use this package in conjunction with the ACID ScraperZ - TV&Movie package.
